title: What the Hellsevier?
dc:creator: Jon Smajda
description: This week we talk about the sociology and economics of academic journal publishing, the Elsevier boycott, and whether the journal system as we know it is necessary anymore. Our decision: everybody can just podcast everything from now on. Starting with…. Episode Number 37
content:encoded:
